short_description.en: No cost insulation, air sealing, and heating/cooling installation for income-qualified residents. Tenants must work with their landlord.
Sales tax holiday from April 19th-April 25th each year for new ENERGY STAR certified appliances, value of up to $1,500 per appliance.
Up to $100 rebate for an ENERGY STAR certified electric water heater, depending on efficiency rating and whether a gas appliance is replaced.
Up to $750/ton rebate for a ground source heat pump.
Up to $750 rebate not to exceed 50% of total cost for a heat pump water heater. Limit 2 per address.
Up to $500 rebate not to exceed 50% of total cost for a heat pump water heater. Limit 2 per address.
$150/ton rebate for ENERGY STAR rated air source heat pumps.
$750/ton rebate for ground source heat pumps.
Free in home weatherization upgrades for income-qualified residents.
$500 rebate for installation of a level 2 electric vehicle charger.
Up to $150 upfront rebate for a smart thermostat.
20% of project cost for attic insulation on existing building, up to $250 rebate.
50% of cost up to $50 rebate for an ENERGY STAR smart thermostat.
Free home efficiency audit and weatherization services for income-qualified residents.
$300 rebate for an electric vehicle charger.
$750/ton rebate for a ground source heat pump installation.
$400/ton rebate for replacement of an existing ground source heat pump.
$150/ton rebate for a qualifying ducted or ductless air source heat pump.
$750/ton rebate for a qualifying ground source heat pump.
50% rebate up to $500 for an ENERGY STAR rated heat pump water heater.
$150/ton for a ducted or ductless air source heat pump. Supplemental heat must be controlled by an automatic thermostat.
$750/ton for a qualifying ground source heat pump.
$300 rebate per system and $150/ton for qualifying air source heat pumps (maximum 2).
$750/ton rebate for a ground source heat pump system.
Up to $850/ton for an ENERGY STAR rated ground source heat pump.
Up to $150/ton for an ENERGY STAR rated air source heat pump.
Up to $250 rebate for an electric water heater. Heat pump water heaters are not eligible.
Up to $250 rebate for an electric vehicle charger, up to 50% of total cost.
50% rebate up to $500 for an ENERGY STAR certified heat pump water heater.
$150/ton rebate for ducted or ductless air source heat pumps.
$750/ton rebate for an ENERGY STAR certified ground source heat pump.
$500 rebate for an air source heat pump when used with another fuel source.
Up to $1,800 rebate for an air source heat pump depending on efficiency level, cold climate rating, and system replaced.
$800 rebate for a heat pump water heater.
$2,000 rebate for a ground source heat pump.
Up to $701 rebate for an ENERGY STAR certified air source heat pump, depending on efficiency rating.
$300 rebate for an ENERGY STAR certified heat pump water heater.
$500 rebate for an ENERGY STAR certified air source heat pump that meets minimum efficiency standards.
$1025 rebate for an ENERGY STAR certified ground source heat pump that meets minimum efficiency standards.
50% up to $500 rebate for an electric vehicle charger.
$250 rebate for a level 2 electric vehicle charger. Cannot exceed 50% of purchase cost.
$500 rebate for a heat pump water heater. Cannot exceed 50% of purchase cost.
Up to $300/ton rebate for an air source heat pump depending on system configuration and efficiency rating. Cannot exceed 50% of purchase cost.
Up to $850/ton rebate for an ground source heat pump depending on system configuration and efficiency rating. Cannot exceed 50% of purchase cost.
$50 rebate for a high-efficiency electric water heater.
$750/ton rebate for a ground source heat pump.
$350/ton rebate for a ducted or ductless air source heat pump.
